name: Barraka
summary: Barraka is a claymation adventure game full of puzzles and surprises. Join our brave heroine as she explores the spooky fair in the small town. Along the way, she will encounter weird and wonderful characters and challenges. You will also have fun with bumper cars, whack-a-mole, the haunted house, a mini circus and more! Barraka is a game that will delight your senses and imagination.
